settings.listenAtChannels: Listen for commands on this channel
settings.sendOnlineAnnounceToChannel: Send online announcement to this channel
settings.sendAnnouncesToChannel: Setup sending of announcements to channels
settings.joinToServerBtn: Click to join bot to your server
settings.cannotJoinToServerBtn: Set token and clientId to be able to join bot to your server
settings.noGuildSelectedBox: Select guild where bot should work and you'll see more settings
